original_text: I wrote as I did, so that when I came I would not be distressed by those who should have made me rejoice. I had confidence in all of you, that you would all share my joy.
korean_text: 내가 이같이 쓴 것은 내가 갈 때에 마땅히 나를 기쁘게 할 자로부터 도리어 근심을 얻을까 염려함이요 또 너희 모두에 대한 나의 기쁨이 너희 모두의 기쁨인 줄 확신함이로라

sentences.original_text: by those who should have made me rejoice
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 기쁘게 해야 할 사람들 때문에

sentences.original_text: I had confidence in all of you
that you would all share my joy
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모두가 나의 기쁨을 함께할 것이라고
